conbody.section:
The control bar is located at the top of the SVG image editor. The control bar contains widgets for modifying elements on the canvas, or choosing how elements are created on to the canvas.
The control bar copies the attributes of the last element selected to the widgets in the control bar.For example, if a red rectangle with blue stroke of size 3 is selected, the stroke section takes the properties stroke-width: 3, stroke-colour: blue. And the fill section will show with red. If a group is selected, it will show 'x' 'x' for the colour attributes, but setting these attributes will change every child in the group
